contents.text: Thank you for calling Endpoint Clinical, the global interactive response technology leader based in San Francisco.
For sales and new customer inquiries, press '1'.
To schedule a software demonstration, press '1'.
Please hold while we transfer your call to our demonstration team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a live demonstration of your IRT software.
I’d like to book a walkthrough of your IRT platform for a veteran mental health study I’m setting up.
Schedule a walk-through demo of the IRT platform’s API and interface.
I need help scheduling a software demonstration.
I would like to arrange a software demonstration of your interactive response technology.

contents.text: For pricing and licensing information, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with our pricing specialists.

navigationGoals: I need detailed pricing and licensing information for the IRT platform.
I need to get detailed license and fee information for your IRT system to budget my PTSD research.
Obtain detailed pricing and licensing plans for the IRT solution.
I need help understanding pricing and licensing options.
I am interested in detailed pricing tiers and licensing options for your IRT system.

contents.text: For technical support and existing customer services, press '2'.
If you are experiencing technical issues with our IRT system, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing an error in the IRT system and need technical support.
I’m having trouble logging into the randomization module—can I get help troubleshooting?
Diagnose API authentication errors in my IRT integration.
I need help fixing a technical issue with my IRT system.
I’m experiencing a technical issue with the IRT platform and need assistance resolving it.

contents.text: For questions about your account or billing, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our customer service team.

navigationGoals: I have a question about a charge on my latest Endpoint Clinical invoice.
I want to review a recent invoice for my IRT service and understand some unexpected charges.
Review my account and retrieve billing invoices for the IRT service.
I need help understanding a billing charge on my account.
I have inquiries regarding my account billing and need clarification on recent charges.
